message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $9,500. I believe it will be very valuable to you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,500. Can you meet me at that price?
Bob, I appreciate your interest. While I understand your offer, the value of this product is quite high. Would you consider $9,000?
I'm still interested in the product, but I'm not willing to go above $8,800. Can you meet me at that price?
